txt.en: 'Come my children! Let us feast!'
'Why're we still here? We're done diggin, ain't we?'
'Yah. Her legginess headed up the tunnel - but the boss said we have to keep watch.'
'Keep watch. Right. I'm sure dat's it.'
All of the roots have been poisoned!
'More like she wants us to keep fresh!'
'I saw one of her brood drag off a goblin not one hour ago, I did.'
'At's right, and you'd best shut yer gob or you'll be next, I warrant....'
'You cowards! Get out here and start fighting or I'll feed ya to her highness myself!'
'Bah. 'et now or 'et later, not sure what the difference is.'
One of the roots attempts to purge your poisons
'This aint goin' so good... I want all of ya out here NOW!'
'It's those black spiky ones what gets me hair up.'
'Can't see em, can't hear em, till what's too late and yer all cocooned and ready ta et.'
'Eh, what about the big'uns? I hear her legginess left a few in the tunnel we dug gettin in here.'
'Can't even cut their webs with a sword, you can't. I tried.'
'Them's the ones we got to watch out for, I say.'
'Ya both got the wrong of it, as usual.'
'It's them tiny ones. Why I saw one of them nip a fellow the other day....'
'Were the tiniest nip mind you, and bam! Dead! Just as quick as you please.'
'At's just not right. A bloke goin' like that from but a nibble.'
You have defeated Frûshkul the Orc captain!
You have defeated Gurthúl!
A root has been poisoned! ([placeholder]/6)
Defeat Gurthúl and her venomous brood beneath the Roots of Fangorn in Great River before they corrupt and sicken the forest above!
'That's enough! I'm puttin' an end to this now!'
'I'm on my way boss! Don't let' em hurt me!'
'Aiieeee! I'm just a messenger! Don't hurt me!'
'Look out! Coming through!'
'Fools! You can't catch me!'
Defeat Frûshkul the Orc captain
One of the forest roots has been poisoned!
Defeat the spider-queen Gurthúl
<rgb=#FF0000>Forest roots poisoned ([placeholder]/6)</rgb>
'Yo, guys! The boss wants ya out here right now! There's elves and dwarves and stuff all over the place!'
'GRAAH! Why dare you interrupt nap?'

A band of Moria Orcs have been ruthlessly enslaved by the spider queen Gurthúl and made to dig a secret tunnel into the natural caverns beneath the Limlight Falls at the edge of Fangorn.\n\nThey are led by a powerful Orc named Frûshkul, who has been left to guard the passages as Gurthúl takes her brood ahead to corrupt and poison Fangorn's deepest roots.
The venomous brood of Gurthúl has burrowed its way beneath the Roots of Fangorn - they must be destroyed before they can poison the forest above!
'Oy! Listen up!'
'Her legginess 'as gone upstairs to 'ave a little nibble at them tree roots.'
'Once she's done, she said she ain't got no use for us. Got it?'
'Hey, ya skinny runt! Get yer butt in here and give the boys a call!'
'Aye. You've got that right. We've got to get shy of this place somehow.'
'So that mean we can go? I don't want no more part of this....'
'Now wait a sec here....'
'If she ain't got no more use fer us....'
'What's ta keep 'er brood from comin back down here and nippin the lot of us?'
'Oy, that there is a right good question it is.... What about it boss?'
'Hey, look what we got here! Get 'em!'
'I say ya both best shut up right now, 'less ya want her legginess down here to nip you  herself!'
'Who dares interrupt my vengeance!?'
Instance: The Roots of Fangorn
'Look out there! We've got company!'
'You will pay for slaughtering my children, and depriving them of sustenance.'
'Just as the Ents shall pay for driving me from my forest lair so long ago!'
'Sap and blood alike shall course with the venom of my brood!'
